title: ranked problems afterupdate
body:
after the update half the time someone invites me i can't join their game.
when i try to create a game myself the invite button isn't even there.
when it does appear sometimes it won't let the other person join or comes up with an error saying (0) people are already in the game or something

also the chat from the game before during champ select appeared when i tried making a new game an hour later.

i've tried restarting client but i'm still getting the same issues

replies.body: Try repairing client, will take about half an hour or so
